entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 12:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 early this evening then west 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 70 gusting to 90 in the morning then diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
